placesVisited: Ho Chi Minh City, Cu Chi Tunnels, Phu Quoc, An Thoi, Da Lat, Cam Ranh
generalInfo: Southern Vietnam leaves little to be desired on this enchanting couple’s tour to its most beloved destinations. You and your partner will discover the magical charm of a country that is steeped in fascinating culture and splendid scenery as you venture to the booming city of Ho Chi Minh, step onto the soft sands of Phu Quoc Island, and submerge yourselves in the picturesque countryside of Da Lat. With exquisite accommodations to retreat to and a divine cuisine to tuck into, you will be swept away by the majesty of this endearing, 10-day adventure through Southern Vietnam.

dayInfo.title: Ho Chi Minh City – A Taste of Vietnam’s Finest Food
dayInfo.description: There are few places in Vietnam that exude the same kind of chaotic energy that Ho Chi Minh City or Saigon does. It is a cultural melting pot that draws in millions of travelers each year, and as a result, it booms with luxurious experiences that you will rarely discover anywhere else across Vietnam’s diverse topography. Its busy districts showcase the unrivaled allure of its imposing influence, where you and your partner will be completely enveloped by its cultural and heritage highlights. Your immersion will begin in the heart of Ho Chi Minh at a 5-star hotel, where you will acclimatize to the area as you soak up the marvelous atmosphere that resonates from the exuberant cityscape. Here, you will have a taste of exceptionally prepared Vietnamese cuisine as an array of first-class restaurants invite you into their fashionable spaces. Luxury is presented in every aspect of this fine dining experience, which you will enjoy on your first evening in Saigon. Delicate fragrances will waft through the restaurant as professional chefs’ work tirelessly to produce the award-winning fusion food that they are most famous for, and each mouthwatering bite will awaken your palate to the unique and distinct flavors that renowned food bloggers yearn to savor when visiting Vietnam.

dayInfo.title: Ho Chi Minh City – Weave Your Way through the Cu Chi Tunnels
dayInfo.description: Though Ho Chi Minh’s premier restaurants serve immaculate meals, the revered chefs add a sophisticated flair to the traditionally-inspired dishes to cater to haute cuisine connoisseurs. For a more authentic taste of Vietnamese cuisine, you will transfer to a morning market that is brimming with charming character. Vendors set up shop early in the morning, and the market will be animated by breakfast time. Accompanied by a professional food guide, you and your partner will meander through the vivid aisles in search of beloved delicacies. Your tour will continue after you have indulged in many of the delicious snacks of Saigon. You will travel away from the bustling city and toward the celebrated Cu Chi Tunnels in the utmost comfort of a private speedboat. The Cu Chi Tunnels, which are steeped in significant history, served as a hiding place for Viet Cong soldiers during the country’s war with France and America. The elaborate network of tunnels is a delight to explore, however, their construction is as a result of a dramatic wartime past that will reveal itself as you wind your way through the web work and out the other side. You will dig deeper into Vietnam’s heritage than ever before as this iconic experience symbolizes the immovable spirit of the locals.

dayInfo.title: Ho Chi Minh City – World-Class Displays of True Artistic Talent
dayInfo.description: Beyond food and history lies Vietnam’s enchanting arts and cultural scene, and you will set off to uncover what makes this scene shine shortly after breakfast. Remarkable galleries and exhibition houses that are dotted around the city will bring you closer than ever to the captivating culture that underpins the county’s thriving creative fields. The Museum of Fine Arts offers a glimpse into the talent that beams from the paintings that hang from its French-Chinese architecturally designed walls. Saigon Outcast shares an impressive display of curated graffiti pieces along its youthful avenues, and Duc Minh Gallery showcases an esteemed private collection of preserved art artifacts in an elegant fashion. Your exploration of the creative arts will be elevated in the evening as you transfer to the Saigon Opera House for the pinnacle of contemporary live performances. Set among the backdrop of the 120-year-old French colonial hall, expertly choreographed performances of cultural grandeur will take place and provide jaw-dropping entertainment for you and your partner.

dayInfo.title: Phu Quoc – Aromatherapy on an Idyllic Island
dayInfo.description: Today, you will escape the hustle of Vietnam’s landlocked destinations to a tropical paradise that knows no bounds. The island of Phu Quoc is situated off the Southern coastline of Vietnam, and you will charter here on board a private speedboat to capture the surreal sights in seclusion. The journey will leave nothing to be desired as you make a brisk getaway across the ultramarine waters of the Gulf of Thailand toward the white sand shores that encompass the entire length of Phu Quoc. Your voyage will culminate at a supreme beachside resort, where you will spend your quiet evenings being blanketed by the natural environment that will surround your splendid villa. The peaceful melodies of chirping birds, the rustle of leaves in the gentle wind, and the calm crashing of waves against the shores will make you feel worlds away from the roaring mainland. A team of exceptional masseuses await your arrival and will invigorate your minds and bodies amidst an undisturbed backdrop of unspoiled scenery. They will knead each knot from your back using a collection of aromatic oils, allowing you and your partner to unwind in tasteful style before you settle in at the resort’s luxurious restaurant for an evening of gourmet Vietnamese cuisine.

dayInfo.title: Phu Quoc – From Lush Jungle to Crystal Clear Sea
dayInfo.description: Phu Quoc’s wondrous wilderness that yearns to be explored, and you will begin your day by dipping your heads in the refreshing flow of Suoi Da Ngon’s gushing waterfalls. You will meet your knowledgeable tour guide after breakfast and transfer to Duong Dong Lake, where you will embark across its lengths on board a traditional barge. The expansive lake, which also serves to generate hydro-electric power, is nestled at the foot of a luscious hill-flanked valley, and the journey across it to Suoi Da Ngon will share stunning vistas of the untamed wildlife. You will hear little noise other than the environments natural ensemble as you delight in your intimate moments that are in sync with nature and finally make it to the sprawling emerald forest that surrounds the rushing falls. Your thorough adventures across Mother Nature’s endearing habitats will lead you to the crystal-clear waters of Phu Quoc’s hideaway beaches. You may set up camp for the day on the pearly white, soft-sand beaches under the shade of their palm tree-lined coasts and enjoy long romantic walks along the rarely visited pristine seashores.

dayInfo.title: Phu Quoc – Amidst the Splendid Sea Life
dayInfo.description: The An Thoi Archipelago, which is a UNESCO Marine Park that consists of 15 islands, lies off the southern coast of Phu Quoc and makes for a world-class day trip from your cozy resort. A private charter that is bound for the archipelago’s precious tropics will collect you in the morning and speed across the waterscape to concealed destinations along the immense stretch of islands. An Thoi will reveal its scenic splendor throughout, showcasing the colossal span of azure waters and brilliant beaches, which will welcome you to the untouched terrain. You and your partner, equipped with high-quality snorkeling gear, will dive into the depths of the sea to witness the staggering coral reefs that hug the island’s coastlines. Brightly-colored fish will swim around you before they retreat to their illuminated coral homes while magnificent octopuses will scamper across the seafloor. There is a wealth of fascinating sea life to see as you wade in the transparent water. You can make your way to shore for a delightful BBQ lunch that is fringed by the sloping sandstone mountains and lose yourselves within this slice of heaven as you wallow in your exquisite meal.

dayInfo.title: Da Lat – The City of Flowers
dayInfo.description: 5-star treatment awaits you within the picturesque landscape of Da Lat, which is a destination that is off the beaten path and is sought-after for its tranquil lake settings, vivid floral gardens, and European-influenced architecture. It is a whimsical location of tremendous countryside beauty that you will call home for a few nights. You can spend the first afternoon at your leisure or spoil yourselves with the impeccable vistas of the verdant vegetation as you tour across the blooming landscape and embrace the fresh, cool breeze. Your tour will converge at the Da Lat Flower Gardens, which is the beating heart of this capital that is often referred to as the City of Flowers. This is where bright rainbow hues cover the vast flourishing fields. Here, you can stroll through the fairytale garden, which releases a bouquet of delicate aromas into the air, and you will capture dreamy moments together alongside the elaborate plant life displays. You will continue your magical meander to the steps of Truc Lam Pagoda, which you will access via the comfort of a cable car across the stunning ravine. You will be provided with the opportunity to look out in all directions, where you can see monks as they carry on with their daily rituals within this intricately decorated and sacred site. It will be a sight to behold, and its serene atmosphere will fill you with a deep adoration for the humble spiritual traditions.

dayInfo.title: Da Lat – Safely Over the Falls
dayInfo.description: Adventurous couples will rejoice as the eighth day of your tour provides many riveting thrills just outside the city center on a canyoning experience that is unlike any other. Your escapade will begin atop a sloping cliff that is decorated with dense foliage, and you will descend into a surging ravine before trekking through the rugged terrain to a rocky ledge, which will be the base of your cliff jump into the depths of the brook. After a comfortable land, you can totally relax as you float along the flowing river while you impress yourself with your brave exploits. You and your partner will be ecstatic to have endured this demanding but fruitful expedition and will return to your room with amazing stories of your fun-filled afternoon. To culminate your adventurous day, you will share a sumptuous Vietnamese meal at a prestigious restaurant in Da Lat.

dayInfo.title: Cam Ranh – Blissful Rays of Beaming Sunshine
dayInfo.description: Your final destination will be an impressive resort in the Cam Ranh Peninsula that offers 5-star luxury within a secluded sandy setting by the beach. The region is less-frequented than its neighboring Nha Trang hotspot, and therefore, makes the perfect romantic getaway from the crowds. Excellent service and first-rate amenities will ensure that your stay satisfies your opulent tastes, providing unmatched intimacy within a tropical paradise. Your picture-perfect suite will look out over a private beach that you will have uninterrupted access to throughout your stay. Grab your things and head to the soft sand for a blissful afternoon under the beaming rays of sunshine that glisten off of the crystal ocean. Your professional bar staff will serve elegant cocktails to your seaside table as you indulge yourselves in absolute relaxation before you settle in at the resort’s esteemed restaurant and tuck into exclusive gastronomic delights. You can use the rest of the evening to connect with one another and cherish the moments of utmost affinity for the finer details of your adventure.

dayInfo.title: Cam Ranh – A Morning to Revitalize the Body
dayInfo.description: Your final day will be spent at your own pace. The sunshine will glimmer through your blindfolds and awaken the sleeping birds that let off a chorus of rhythmic chirps. You may hop out of bed and into the pool for a morning under the sun’s embrace or venture straight for the delicious breakfast spread of succulent, international, and Vietnamese cuisine. You will then indulge in the plethora of revitalizing spa treatments at the exemplified wellness center, where you will be completely spoiled for choice. Here, all of your stresses wash away with your gentle and therapeutic oil massage before you ready your things and wait for your private transfer. You and your partner, after having experienced many enchanting moments, you will depart Vietnam totally jubilant with your intimate vacation together.
